channel.title: Recoloring npcs [pi]

item.title: Recoloring npcs [pi]
item.dc:creator: @darknessxd darknessxd
item.description:
@darknessxd wrote:

so i’m trying to add a custom boss just from recoloring and changing a few gfx and attacks server sided. so i need some help recoloring the boss. here is a picture of the boss:

alduin.png775×533

now here is the code i have set up in entitydef.java:

if(i == 4000) { // NPC ID 
	entityDef.actions = new String[5];
	entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack";
	entityDef.models = new int[4]; // Number of models the NPC uses
	entityDef.models[0] = 27772; // 27789
entityDef.models[1] = 27771;
entityDef.models[2] = 27774;
entityDef.models[3] = 17390;
	entityDef.originalModelColors = new int[4];
	entityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[4];
	entityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 910; 
	entityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 28131; //recolor
entityDef.originalModelColors[1] = 912; 
	entityDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 49500; // recolor
entityDef.originalModelColors[2] = 1938; 
	entityDef.modifiedModelColors[2] = 9583; //recolor
entityDef.originalModelColors[3] = 1814; 
	entityDef.modifiedModelColors[3] = 38693; //recolor
entityDef.name = "Alduin"; 
	entityDef.combatLevel = 643; 
entityDef.walkAnim = 63;
entityDef.standAnim = 66;
entityDef.aByte68 = 3;
entityDef.description = "He Contains Immence Evil Power.".getBytes(); // NPC description
}

as you can see the recolor did not work and the boss stayed his normal colors
thanks in advance

Read full topic
